nodes.text: Paradise was a space station located on a small hyperspace route branching off of the Corellian Trade Spine. It was known for pirates and slavers more than it was for shipping or commercial goods. It was also well known for its gambling, pleasure slaves, and sales of various illegal narcotics. Lucia met with the Iktotchi assassin Huntress at Paradise in 980 BBY to hire her to assassinate the rebel leader Gelba and later to hire her again for a mission to capture Darth Bane.
